name: Rasta Run! 3D
description:
Can you collect the most coins? or get to full speed? or maybe go the greatest distance? Rasta run! 3D is a runner that will put your reflexes to the test, get ready for the best experience with Raz, a rasta who lost his bus! help him find his way!
